thread.title: Samantha (Wethersfield CT)
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Samantha (Wethersfield CT)

author: Samantha (Wethersfield CT)
title: Samantha (Wethersfield CT)
text: I was helped as soon as it was my turn, while waiting shortly the employee seemed to be dealing with a "know-it-all" type customer. The employee was very respectful to the gentlemen and promptly tended to me. I was able to get right into the the back garage area for my vehicle to be serviced. I was very happy with the amount I paid for my service and how quick it took!
